3: Miss Luna is already here. Are you all ready?
Of course! I've even left a little gift for our guests from Babylonia.
You're playing around again.
We all have our passions, do we not, Mr. Gabriel? I just don't have such a lofty and delicate one like yours.
Machines, Constructs, Humans, Punishing Virus, whatever comes of this ragged doll of a world, I have no interest...
I exist to protect Miss Luna and ensure her wishes are fulfilled. That is all.
Please... please... let us in the Ascension-Network...
Please share with us the power of Miss Luna...
And relieve us of the Punishing Virus...
How naive... Only by embracing and accepting it, are you fit to control the power of the Punishing Virus.
To wish for relief—you have already lost your chance.
Ugh...
Roland swings his weapon, and the Corrupted is quickly split into two halves.
To join the core of Ascnet and be bestowed Miss Luna's power, you will have to prove yourself—
Prove that you are crueler... more dreadful... and deadlier... than the virus.
Only so, are you fit to become the owner of the virus, do you understand?
The owner of the... virus...
Become the... owner!
There will be a band of humans coming here soon. Use this opportunity to prove yourself to Miss Luna.
Humans...
Destroy... humans! Destroy... humans!
Roland.
Yes, milady?
Please don't fool around too long with my sister and her friends. You know you have better things to do than that.
Of course! Among those hypocritical and disorganized humans, I'll find an appropriate...
Seed...
